Query:
SELECT
  p.* 
FROM
  OrderPayments p WITH (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  p.PaymentKey IN(${parameters})
Name: Bağımsız tahsilat verisi

Query:
SELECT 
  h.BranchID,
  h.OrderID,
  h.OrderKey,
  h.OrderDateTime,
  h.StationID,
  ROUND(ABS(h.AmountDue), 2) AS [AmountDue],
  h.ReturnCustomerName AS [CustomerName],
  h.ReturnCustomerAddress AS [Address],
  h.ReturnTaxNumber AS [TaxNumber],
  h.ReturnTaxOffice AS [TaxOffice],
  h.ReturnSerialNo AS [SerialNo],
  h.ReturnReason AS [Reason],
  h.ReturnIsPaid AS [IsPaid],
  '' AS [SplitHeader],
  t.BranchID,
  t.OrderID,
  t.OrderKey,
  t.TransactionKey,
  t.MenuItemKey,
  t.MenuItemText,
  t.AccountingCode,
  ROUND((ABS(t.ExtendedPrice) * 100 / (100 + t.TaxPercent)), 5) AS [Amount],
  ROUND((ABS(t.ExtendedPrice) * t.TaxPercent / (100 + t.TaxPercent)), 5) AS [TaxAmount],
  t.TaxPercent,
  ABS(t.Quantity) AS [Quantity],
  ABS(t.MenuItemUnitPrice) AS [UnitPrice],
  ABS(t.ExtendedPrice) AS [ExtendedPrice],
  t.MainMenuItemText,
  t.MainMenuItemTransactionKey,
  t.IsMainCombo,
  ISNULL(t.OrderByWeight, 0) AS [OrderByWeight],
  '' AS [SplitTransaction],
  p.BranchID,
  p.OrderID,
  p.OrderKey,
  p.PaymentKey,
  p.PaymentMethodName,
  p.GlobalBankName,
  p.GlobalBankCode,
  ABS(p.AmountPaid) AS [AmountPaid]
FROM
 OrderHeaders h WITH (NOLOCK)
LEFT JOIN OrderTransactions t WITH (NOLOCK) ON t.OrderKey = h.OrderKey AND t.LineDeleted = 0
LEFT JOIN OrderPayments p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.OrderKey = h.OrderKey AND p.LineDeleted = 0
WHERE
  h.OrderKey IN(${parameters})
Name: İade verisi

Query:
SELECT 
  s.*,
  '' AS [SplitHeader],
  si.*
FROM
 posSheets s WITH ( NOLOCK ) 
 LEFT JOIN posSheetItems si ON si.SheetKey = s.SheetKey
WHERE
  s.SheetKey IN(${parameters})
Name: Föy verisi

Query:
SELECT
  c.*,
  
  '' AS [SplitHeader],
  
  cp.*,
  
  '' AS [SplitPhone],
  
  ca.*,
  
  '' AS [SplitContact],
  
  cc.*,
  
  '' AS [SplitAddress],
  
  cf.*
FROM
  CustomerFiles c WITH (NOLOCK) 
  LEFT JOIN CustomerPhones cp WITH (NOLOCK) ON cp.CustomerKey = c.CustomerKey
  LEFT JOIN CustomerAddresses ca WITH (NOLOCK) ON ca.CustomerKey = c.CustomerKey
  LEFT JOIN CustomerContacts cc WITH (NOLOCK) ON cc.CustomerKey = c.CustomerKey
  LEFT JOIN CustomerFeedback cf WITH (NOLOCK) ON cf.CustomerKey = c.CustomerKey
WHERE
  c.CustomerKey IN(${parameters})
Name: Müşteriler, Telefonları, Adresleri, Kontakları, Geribildirimleri

Query:
SELECT
  m.*,
  '' AS [SplitMenu],
  c.*,
  '' AS [SplitCategory],
  g.* 
FROM
  MenuItems m WITH (NOLOCK)
  LEFT JOIN MenuCategories c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.MenuCategoryKey = m.MenuCategoryKey
  LEFT JOIN MenuSubCategories g WITH (NOLOCK) ON g.MenuSubCategoryKey = m.MenuGroupKey
WHERE
  m.MenuItemKey IN(${parameters})
Name: Menü, Kategorileri, Grupları

  e.EmployeeKey IN(${parameters})

Query:
SELECT
  g.*,
  
  '' AS [SplitTableGroup],
  
  t.*
FROM
  DineInTableGroups g WITH (NOLOCK) 
  LEFT JOIN DineInTables t WITH (NOLOCK) ON t.TableGroupKey =  g.TableGroupKey
WHERE
  g.TableGroupKey IN(${parameters})
  OR t.DineInTableKey IN(${parameters})
Name: Masa Grupları ve Planları

WHERE

Query:
SELECT
  p.[Id] AS [AutoID],
  p.[Key] AS [PersonalKey],
  p.NameSurname AS [NameSurname],
  p.CardNumber AS [CardNumber],
  p.RegistrationNumber AS [RegistrationNumber],
  p.IsActive AS [IsActive],
  c.Name AS [CompanyName],
  po.Name AS [PouchName],
  pp.Total AS [PouchTotal],
  ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.Amount > 0 THEN t.Amount ELSE 0 END),0) AS [TopUpTotal],
  ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.Amount < 0 THEN ABS(t.Amount) ELSE 0 END),0) AS [SpendTotal]
FROM
  ISS_TEKFEN.dbo.Personals p WITH (NOLOCK)
  INNER JOIN ISS_TEKFEN.dbo.PersonalPouches pp WITH (NOLOCK) ON pp.[PersonalKey] = p.[Key]
  INNER JOIN ISS_TEKFEN.dbo.Pouches po WITH (NOLOCK) ON po.[Key] = pp.[PouchKey]
  INNER JOIN ISS_TEKFEN.dbo.Companies c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.[Key] = p.[CompanyKey]
  LEFT JOIN ISS_TEKFEN.dbo.Transactions t WITH (NOLOCK) ON t.[PersonalKey] = p.[Key] AND t.[PouchKey] = pp.[PouchKey] AND t.[Status] = 1
WHERE
   p.[Key] IN(${parameters})
GROUP BY
    p.[Id],
    p.[Key],
    p.NameSurname,
    p.CardNumber,
    p.RegistrationNumber,
    p.IsActive,
    c.Name,
    po.Name,
    pp.Total
Name: Tekfen Personelleri
